p: To further dissect the subtype C distribution in Gondar, sub-subtyping into subtype C clades and detection of putative intra-subtype C recombinants were performed using sequences obtained from this study population and all previously reported HIV-1 pol sequences from Gondar [ 23â€“ 25]. Briefly, reference sequences of the three subtype C clades were obtained as described in S1 Text. Putative intra-subtype recombinant subtype C sequences were identified by jpHMM [ 44] using parameters as outlined in S1 Text. The final subtyping ML tree is shown in S1 Fig.
